message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Given its exceptional features and capabilities, we believe it would be an invaluable asset to your endeavors. We're offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $2000000. Let's make this extraordinary product yours today!

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality and features of your product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a price of $1500000 for the product.
